title: Greg's Son is a GAMER!
description:
Unsurprisingly, Greg's son is a gamer. 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tcNIhFLKk94
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.
A Better Paradise is out now and available everywhere you get your podcasts."


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: of course I wanted to segue into a fun topic with uh two gaming dads Gary I still miss you and I love you uh but Greg you get to fill in Gary wi today and uh you know last week you posted a really fun one you and your son shared an awesome gaming moment you beat your first level of Mario together and I thought that was really cute and you kind of wanted to have a conversation of course Paris has his family they've had gaming moments I've had great gaming moments with my mother so I want to talk about you know gaming moments with the family and more specifically your kid sure yeah you know I what I always talk about with uh gaming and kids and all these different things right is that before I even met Jen I'm fairly certain maybe actually maybe we had maybe we had already been married I forget but like Jen's what turned me around in having kids right first date she mentioned it I was like yes it's the whole thing uh and it was that I maybe it was the destiny 2's launch Donald mustard

but like Jen's what turned me around in having kids right first date she mentioned it I was like yes it's the whole thing uh and it was that I maybe it was the destiny 2's launch Donald mustard formerly of Epic Games formerly of fortnite and all that had posted on Instagram or on Twitter uh that him and the boys were so excited that in the basement they had quad flat screens on the TV and one was running college football on Saturday and the other three was running Destiny and they were playing it and I was like I cannot that is an amazing thing that I can't wait to one day get to and we haven't had like a plan for introducing Ben to video games like that hasn't been thing again Ben you know my son he's 2 and a half years old so so it hasn't been like oh we're going to wait till the sage or do this thing and blah blah blah blah blah and you know throughout these two years uh I've shown him a game here or there or whatever and you know he originally got super into Hot Wheels unleash 2
